raw_body: HAKMANA – ANANDA BANDARA : Son of late Wijeratne Banda Hakmana of Ambalagala Walawwa and Mallika Kumarihamy Imbuldeniya of Angammana Walawwa,​ beloved husband of Sumithra Kadurugamuwa of Koskanuwe Walawwa,​ loving father of Hasitha and Danushka,​ father-in-law of Wathsala and Shashika,​ loving grandfather of Iruja and Vidam,​ brother of late Jayantha Bandara Hakmana,​ late Mahinda Bandara Hakmana,​ Malini Kumari Hakmana and Tikiri Bandara Hakmana (Thilak),​ brother-in-law of Chandra,​ late Chandrasiri Kularatne and Machila,​ expired. Remains lie at Rohini Funeral Parlour,​ Maharagama. Cortege leaves Parlour on Friday,​ 12th January 2024 at 6.00 p.m. for Cremation at General Cemetery,​ Godigamuwa.002945
